snippet: Congo’s president called Wednesday for the arrest of notorious ex-warlord, Bosco Ntaganda, who has been serving in the country’s army despite an international indictment on war crimes charges.
abstract: Pres Joseph Kabila of Congo calls for the arrest of notorious ex-warlord, Bosco Ntaganda, who has been serving in the country’s army despite an international indictment on war crimes charges.
lead_paragraph: Congo’s president called Wednesday for the arrest of notorious ex-warlord, Bosco Ntaganda, who has been serving in the country’s army despite an international indictment on war crimes charges.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
